### Reg {#a2a0613efb7b3c34a164c76f9a6cd98a6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Register llvm::RegScavenger::ScavengedInfo::Reg">
If non-zero, the specific register is currently being scavenged.

That is, it is spilled to this scavenging stack slot.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerscavenging-h">RegisterScavenging.h</a>.
